FILAMER CHRISTIAN UNIVERSITY Third -Year College Student

Hello! My name is Rose Ann Mae B. Feril . I am currently a Third-year student at FILAMER CHRISTIAN UNIVERSITY , INC. , pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Information and Technology . I am a working student and serve as an encoder at the Property Custodian Office, where I gain valuable experience in data management and administrative support.

While I am passionate about advancing my skills in information technology, I am particularly interested in web development and web design. I am eager to learn more about front-end and back-end development, as well as UI/UX design, and I am excited about combining my technical expertise with creativity in the web development field.
